## EventHandler

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/commandkit/src/types.ts" sourceLine="59" packageName="commandkit" />

Represents an event handler for a specific event.

```ts title="Signature"
type EventHandler<K extends keyof ClientEvents> = (
  ...args: ClientEvents[K]
) => void | Promise<void>
```
